headline: Super Micro Ended Loan Pacts That Had Become More Burdensome
summary: Super Micro Computer  has ended loan agreements with two banks as recent amendments to those pacts made them more burdensome.  The move frees up some cash, and removes restrictions tied to the embattled server maker’s late filing of audited financial statements.  On Nov. 20, Super Micro “prepaid in full and terminated its obligations” under a loan agreement with Cathay Bank, it said in a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission late Tuesday.

raw.headline: Super Micro Ended Loan Pacts That Had Become More Burdensome

The move frees up some cash, and removes restrictions tied to the embattled server maker’s late filing of audited financial statements.  On Nov. 20, Super Micro “prepaid in full and terminated its obligations” under a loan agreement with Cathay Bank, it said in a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission late Tuesday.

headline: Week’s Best: UBS’ Bold Move to Lower Advisor Pay
summary: In a rare move for a wealth management operation,  UBS  amended its compensation plan for next year, trimming payouts for lower-producing financial advisors.  The move risks advisor departures in the short term but could help the Swiss bank improve the profitability of its U.S. wealth management unit.  Advisors who manage relatively smaller sums of money will likely be hardest hit.

Advisors who manage relatively smaller sums of money will likely be hardest hit.

headline: Liquidity in Private Equity at 4th Palm Beach CorpGov Forum
summary: PE Edge and Exec Edge are pleased to provide complete video coverage of the fourth annual Palm Beach CorpGov Forum held on Nov. 13-14, featuring a two-day event with panels, firesides and networking receptions. headline: Eurozone Assets Could Lag U.S. Peers as Economic Growth Diverges
summary: European equities, credit and the euro are expected to perform worse than their U.S. counterparts as the eurozone’s economy deteriorates while the U.S. economy advances, analysts say.

headline: Invesco Comstock Fund Q3 2024 Commentary
